body: 3rd chapter isnt the real ending. Nana sees Misumi controlling her body as dreams, she remembers Misumi doing it with Gakubuchi and the 2 old guys, so real ending is her being with Gakubuchi. Misumis an asshole though so if hes gone for good then good riddance.

Despite it being a dream some of you saying that it was "good until the end" have me dying, cuz I was literally waiting for it.
